However , limited literature understand haptic orientation negative dysphotopsia ; postulate theory anecdotal report relate horizontal haptic orientation lateralization ray light receive small width anterior peripheral retina ; however , formal study currently exist .
DOC.criteria: Patients bilateral cataract visually significant meet standard criterion removal select standard monofocal lens implantation . Patients prior refractive surgery include prior cataract surgery , corneal ocular pathology , iris atrophy/damage , retinal optic nerve pathology . Patients history peripheral vision loss . Patients select multifocal toric lens implantation .
